shares

Class ShareProtocol

  • java.lang.Object
    • dsl.Play<java.lang.Integer>
      • shares.ShareProtocol

  • class ShareProtocol
extends Play<java.lang.Integer>
    This class implements the centralized description of the share protocol (or should it be the "The N Smart Meters and the Suspicious Data Concentrator"?).
    Author:
    sys

    • Constructor Detail

      • ShareProtocol

        public ShareProtocol(int smartMeterNumber)
        Constructs a ShareProtocol instance for a given number of smart meters.
        Parameters:
        smartMeterNumber - the number of smart meters involved, plus the data concentrator. It should be at least 1, since the data concentrator is always present.

    • Method Detail
